incentives.name: Indiana Property Tax Exemption for Solar
incentives.description: Solar energy systems are exempt from personal property tax assessment
incentives.administering_body: Indiana Department of Local Government Finance

incentives.name: Indiana Sales Tax Exemption for Solar
incentives.description: Solar energy equipment exempt from state sales tax

incentives.name: Indiana Net Metering (Transitioning)
incentives.description: Indiana transitioning from net metering to excess distributed generation rate. New interconnections may receive lower credit rate than full retail.
incentives.value: Transitioning from retail to lower rate
